title: Build problem with `dng_sdk`
body:
I tried pulling the latest changes today and rebuilding, and I get the following error when running `bootstrapper.ps1 -Target clean-externals`:

```
========================================
clean-externals
========================================
Executing task: clean-externals
Cleaning directory C:/Users/Tyler/Documents/otherdev/SkiaSharp/skia/out
The provided pattern did not match any directories.
Cleaning directory C:/Users/Tyler/Documents/otherdev/SkiaSharp/native-builds/lib
The provided pattern did not match any directories.
The provided pattern did not match any directories.
The provided pattern did not match any directories.
The provided pattern did not match any directories.
The provided pattern did not match any directories.
Cleaning directory C:/Users/Tyler/Documents/otherdev/SkiaSharp/native-builds/libSkiaSharp_windows/Release
Cleaning directory C:/Users/Tyler/Documents/otherdev/SkiaSharp/native-builds/libSkiaSharp_windows/x64/Release
An error occured when executing task.
Error: Could not find a part of the path 'C:\Users\Tyler\Documents\otherdev\SkiaSharp\skia\third_party\externals\dng_sdk
\source\dng_string.cpp'.
```

The `SkiaSharp\skia\third_party\externals\dng_sdk` directory doesn't exist on disk.
